Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X+450) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:hidden(0) self:zoom(2) self:glow(ColorRGB(1)) self:zoomx(0.03) self:diffusealpha(1) self:blend('WeightedMultiply') self:linear(6) self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X-120) self:queuecommand('Loop') end
Layer.LoopCommand: %function(self) self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X+450) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:hidden(0) self:zoom(2) self:glow(ColorRGB(1)) self:zoomx(0.03) self:diffusealpha(1) self:blend('WeightedMultiply') self:linear(6) self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X-120) self:queuecommand('Loop') end

Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X+450) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:hidden(0) self:zoom(2) self:glow(ColorRGB(2)) self:zoomx(0.03) self:diffusealpha(1) self:sleep(1) self:blend('WeightedMultiply') self:linear(6) self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X-120) self:queuecommand('Loop') end
